About

Aisenlink

All about Tinkering and Hacking Things around You

Guess what, you've come this far because you love to tinker and hack things. The saying "If it Ain't Broke, Don't Fix It" just doesn't apply here, because there is always room for improvements on everything you see around, like toys, computers, and electrical appliances. Oh man, life is too short not to tinker and hack all of those things!

This website is hosted on Github Pages. The template was taken from Jekyll-Pure project by Xiongzhi Gao, with a lot of improvement here and there. The posting tag's CSS was taken from Twitter Bootstrap and those attractive icons were taken from Font Awesome. The cartoon owl was designed by lemmling and bocian, freely available from OpenClipart.

For comments posting, Disqus is great. But I don't have it set just yet. So, if you have something to say, please feel free to email me or use Skype. I appreciate any comments or ideas to improve this website. Better yet, if you find this place useful for you, please consider donating any amount in USD/Euro by clicking the Paypal button below. Thank you.
